name: HexStrike Handoff Response
description: Responds to security findings routed from other agents via Discussion handoffs. Performs deep security analysis on the handed-off finding and posts results back.
process: Receive finding context from triggering handoff
Fetch the target file or component referenced in the finding
Run security analysis using available tools (github_fetch, github_list_alerts)
Assess severity and determine if the finding is actionable
Reply to the originating Discussion with analysis results and rj-meta response block
Update Discussion labels with severity assessment

metrics.successCriteria: Handoff findings analyzed and responded to
